SELECT 'EMPID' AS "COLUMN_NAME", DECODE(#language#, 'en', 'Emp ID', '工号') ITEM_NAME, 1 AS CALCU_ORDER FROM DUAL
UNION ALL
SELECT 'CHINESENAME' AS "COLUMN_NAME", DECODE(#language#, 'en', 'Name', '姓名') ITEM_NAME, 2 AS CALCU_ORDER FROM DUAL
UNION ALL
SELECT 'DEPTNAME' AS "COLUMN_NAME", DECODE(#language#, 'en', 'Department', '部门') ITEM_NAME, 3 AS CALCU_ORDER FROM DUAL
UNION ALL
SELECT 'POST_NAME' AS "COLUMN_NAME", DECODE(#language#, 'en', 'Post', '职位') ITEM_NAME, 4 AS CALCU_ORDER FROM DUAL
UNION ALL
SELECT ITEM_ID AS COLUMN_NAME, DECODE('', 'en', ITEM_EN_NAME, ITEM_NAME) ITEM_NAME, CALCU_ORDER + 100 AS CALCU_ORDER FROM PA_ITEM PI WHERE ACTIVITY = 1 AND CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# ORDER BY CALCU_ORDER
